Description: Limestone stand for water-bottles; sunken top surface with three shallow circular recesses; foliated relief decoration and a mask at the centre.
Bibliographic references: Dalton 1921 / A Guide to the early Christian and Byzantine antiquities in the Department of British and Mediaeval Antiquities (p.12, fig. 6) (incl. image)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.208)
Exhibition history: 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil'
